name: Keto Low-Carb Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
author: Nicki Morganti
summary: These are high in fat but you could probably substitute water for cream if you wanted to cut the calories down a little.
ingredients: ⅓ cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)
2 tablespoons heavy whipping cream, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a muffin tin or line with paper muffin liners
Mix sweetener, almond flour, coconut flour, poppy seeds, lemon zest, baking powder, salt, and xanthan gum together in a bowl
Beat eggs in a bowl with an electric mixer on high speed until fluffy, about 2 minutes
Beat in butter, sour cream, and vanilla extract
Stir in cream slowly until batter is thick and smooth
Bake in the preheated oven until tops are golden, 15 to 20 minutes
